mapper.select: select post_id, post_code, post_name, post_sort, status, create_time, update_time, tenant_id, remark, create_user, update_user, del_flag from sys_post where post_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_post(post_id, post_code, post_name, post_sort, status, create_time, update_time, tenant_id, remark, create_user, update_user, del_flag) values (#{postId}, #{postCode}, #{postName}, #{postSort}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{tenantId}, #{remark}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{delFlag})

insert into sys_post(post_id, post_code, post_name, post_sort, status, create_time, update_time, tenant_id, remark, create_user, update_user, del_flag) values
(#{entity.postId}, #{entity.postCode}, #{entity.postName}, #{entity.postSort}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.createUser}, #{entity.updateUser}, #{entity.delFlag})

insert into sys_post(post_id, post_code, post_name, post_sort, status, create_time, update_time, tenant_id, remark, create_user, update_user, del_flag) values
(#{entity.postId}, #{entity.postCode}, #{entity.postName}, #{entity.postSort}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.createUser}, #{entity.updateUser}, #{entity.delFlag})
on duplicate key update post_id = values(post_id), post_code = values(post_code), post_name = values(post_name), post_sort = values(post_sort), status = values(status), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), tenant_id = values(tenant_id), remark = values(remark), create_user = values(create_user), update_user = values(update_user), del_flag = values(del_flag)
mapper.update:
update sys_post
post_code = #{postCode},
post_name = #{postName},
post_sort = #{postSort},
status = #{status},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
remark = #{remark},
create_user = #{createUser},
update_user = #{updateUser},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
where post_id = #{postId}
